title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 94 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 94 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: O Lord God, to whom vengeance belongeth; O God, to whom vengeance belongeth, shew thyself.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，你是伸冤的神。伸冤的神阿，求你发出光来。

lineList.en: Lift up thyself, thou judge of the earth: render a reward to the proud.
lineList.cn: 审判世界的主阿，求你挺身而立，使骄傲人受应得的报应。

lineList.en: LORD, how long shall the wicked, how long shall the wicked triumph?
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，恶人夸胜要到几时呢，要到几时呢。

lineList.en: How long shall they utter and speak hard things? and all the workers of iniquity boast themselves?
lineList.cn: 他们絮絮叨叨，说傲慢的话。一切作孽的人，都自己夸张。

lineList.en: They break in pieces thy people, O LORD, and afflict thine heritage.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，他们强压你的百姓，苦害你的产业。

lineList.en: They slay the widow and the stranger, and murder the fatherless.
lineList.cn: 他们杀死寡妇和寄居的，又杀害孤儿。

lineList.en: Yet they say, The LORD shall not see, neither shall the God of Jacob regard it.
lineList.cn: 他们说，耶和华必不看见，雅各的神必不思念。

lineList.en: Understand, ye brutish among the people: and ye fools, when will ye be wise?
lineList.cn: 你们民间的畜类人当思想。你们愚顽人，到几时才有智慧呢。

lineList.en: He that planted the ear, shall he not hear? he that formed the eye, shall he not see?
lineList.cn: 造耳朵的，难道自己不听见吗。造眼睛的，难道自己不看见吗。

lineList.en: He that chastiseth the heathen, shall not he correct? he that teacheth man knowledge, shall not he know?
lineList.cn: 管教列邦的，就是叫人得知识的，难道自己不惩治人吗。

lineList.en: The LORD knoweth the thoughts of man, that they are vanity.
lineList.cn: 耶和华知道人的意念是虚妄的。

lineList.en: Blessed is the man whom thou chastenest, O LORD, and teachest him out of thy law;
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，你所管教，用律法所教训的人，是有福的。

lineList.en: That thou mayest give him rest from the days of adversity, until the pit be digged for the wicked.
lineList.cn: 你使他在遭难的日子，得享平安。惟有恶人陷在所挖的坑中。

lineList.en: For the LORD will not cast off his people, neither will he forsake his inheritance.
lineList.cn: 因为耶和华必不丢弃他的百姓，也不离弃他的产业。

lineList.en: But judgment shall return unto righteousness: and all the upright in heart shall follow it.
lineList.cn: 审判要转向公义。心里正直的，必都随从。

lineList.en: Who will rise up for me against the evildoers? or who will stand up for me against the workers of iniquity?
lineList.cn: 谁肯为我起来攻击作恶的。谁肯为我站起抵挡作孽的。

lineList.en: Unless the LORD had been my help, my soul had almost dwelt in silence.
lineList.cn: 若不是耶和华帮助我，我就住在寂静之中了。

lineList.en: When I said, My foot slippeth; thy mercy, O LORD, held me up.
lineList.cn: 我正说我失了脚，耶和华阿，那时你的慈爱扶助我。

lineList.en: In the multitude of my thoughts within me thy comforts delight my soul.
lineList.cn: 我心里多忧多疑，你安慰我，就使我欢乐。

lineList.en: Shall the throne of iniquity have fellowship with thee, which frameth mischief by a law?
lineList.cn: 那藉着律例架弄残害，在位上行奸恶的，岂能与你相交吗。

lineList.en: They gather themselves together against the soul of the righteous, and condemn the innocent blood.
lineList.cn: 他们大家聚集攻击义人，将无辜的人定为死罪。

lineList.en: But the LORD is my defence; and my God is the rock of my refuge.
lineList.cn: 但耶和华向来作了我的高台。我的神作了我投靠的磐石。

lineList.en: And he shall bring upon them their own iniquity, and shall cut them off in their own wickedness; yea, the LORD our God shall cut them off.
lineList.cn: 他叫他们的罪孽归到他们身上。他们正在行恶之中，他要剪除他们。耶和华我们的神要把他们剪除。
